description:
## Hands-on
### Task
Given the CSV with locations. Generate triples with the data properties ***foaf:name***, ***geo:lat*** and ***geo:long*** in order to achieve the expected results.
### CSV file content
| CName | latitude | longitude |
|--|--|--|--|
| Oneonta | "44.9625428" | "-74.4168577" |
| Iowa | "29.6862705" | "-82.319746" |
| Alberta | "41.0816094" | "-76.4098259" |
| Bock | "41.6908535" | "-85.9562663" | 
| Elmhurst | "31.4199205" | "-109.9103821" |
